TopicTitle: Building in VAB and SPH at the same time...

Articles.Content: There is a mod that allows you to build in the KSP and the VAB at the same time...... it allows you to switch the building characteristics and u can switch back and forth no matter which building you are in........I re-installed KSP and accidentally erased all the mods.... someone please let me know if you know of it thank you!
Thats Editor Tools, or EdTools, i used to have that too but it did not work so well with .20, if someone has an updated version of this mod, that would be great^^
Thanks mate!! Appreciate it!! ugh!! it was working fine with me........ now im scared LOL re installs suck! lol

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/31580-Plugin-0-20-EditorTools-%28EdTools%29

There ya go. This is one of my favorite mods

I especially like the vertical snap.
